price: កន្លែងវិលត្រឡប់របស់ពួកអ្នកគឺទៅកាន់អល់ឡោះតែមួយ គត់។ ហើយទ្រង់មានអានុភាពលើអ្វីៗទាំងអស់។
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
